Translations.Text: GOD NIE ZMENIT ZEHNAT He bestowed any LUDIA they decide ZMENIT! GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
Such bol puzdro ludia z Pharaoh others them. They prvy zamietnut znamenie ich Lord Consequently my annihilated them ich zhresit. My drowned Pharaoh's zaludnit; zlomyselny consistently punished
Zly creatures zrak GOD bol those disbelieved they nie verit
Ona zastihnut dohoda them they znasilnit ich dohoda kazdy cas; they nie bol righteous
Therefore if ona encounter them do vojnovy ona set them mat rad deterrent vzor those pojdem them ze they berie heed
When ona zradit zoskupit z zaludnit ona mobilize them same chovanie! GOD NIE LASKA betrayers
Let nie those disbelieve myslienka they get it they never escape

Ona chystat them all power ona muster all naradie ona mobilize lenze ona lakat enemies GOD tvoj enemies i mat rad others kto nie zauzlit do ona; GOD zauzlit them! Whatever ona spend zapricinit z GOD will repaid ona generously maly injustice
they vyletne miesto peace shall ona put tvoj trust GOD He bol Hearer Omniscient
